links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (24, -128).
mathematica: Table[8^(n-1) (2^n-1),{n,20}] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{24,-128},{1,24},20] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 20 2014 *)
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 100, write("b060195.txt", n, " ", 8^(n - 1)*(2^n - 1)); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 02 2009]
author: Manish Kumar Gupta (M.Gupta(AT)math.canterbury.ac.nz), Mar 21 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com) and Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Mar 21 2001
